title: What's Your Coffee Vibe?
subtitle: Answer 8 questions to discover your caffeine personality

questions.text: It's Monday morning. How do you approach your first coffee?

options.text: Triple shot, no waiting, inject it directly
Carefully crafted pour-over with a side of peace
Grab yesterday's cold brew from the fridge
Something colorful that confuses the barista

questions.text: Your ideal coffee shop vibe is:

options.text: Standing bar, no seats, everyone's in a hurry
Cozy corner with plants and jazz music
Pink walls, neon signs, very Instagrammable

questions.text: How do you handle a 3pm energy crash?

options.text: Decaf latte with oat milk and a cookie
I meal-prepped cold brew for this exact moment
A minute while I customize every detail
I don't order, I bring my own
Long enough to explain what ceremonial grade means
Tiny ceramic cup, authentic Italian style
Oversized mug with a motivational quote

questions.text: How many coffees per day is 'normal'?

options.text: One giant batch that lasts all day

questions.text: Your friends describe your coffee habits as:

espresso.title: The Espresso Addict
espresso.description: Sleep is for the weak, and you've got things to DO. You're the person who's already sent 47 emails before anyone else has even opened their laptop. Your blood type is probably 'dark roast' and your spirit animal is a caffeinated hummingbird. Doctors are concerned. Your productivity is not.
espresso.perfectDrink: Quad shot espresso, no water, no milk, no nonsense
espresso.shareText: I'm The Espresso Addict! My blood type is dark roast.

latte.title: Latte Art Master
latte.description: You don't just drink coffee, you experience it. Every cup is an opportunity for mindfulness, aesthetic appreciation, and a perfectly angled photo. Your oat milk is organic, your sweater is cozy, and your vibes are immaculate. You've definitely said 'self-care' unironically today.
latte.perfectDrink: Oat milk latte with vanilla and a rosetta on top
latte.shareText: I'm a Latte Art Master! Cozy vibes only.

coldbrew.title: Chill Cold Brew
coldbrew.description: Efficiency is your love language. Why make coffee every morning when you can batch-brew enough to last a week? You're low-maintenance but high-functioning, probably wearing the same hoodie for the third day (it's clean, you think). Maximum caffeine, minimum effort. Respect.
coldbrew.perfectDrink: 32oz cold brew, black, from a mason jar
coldbrew.shareText: I'm Chill Cold Brew! Maximum caffeine, minimum effort.

matcha.title: Chaos Matcha
matcha.description: You've evolved beyond basic coffee culture into the realm of ceremonial-grade enlightenment. Your drinks have ingredients most people can't pronounce, and you've definitely explained the L-theanine/caffeine synergy to someone who didn't ask. Chaotic? Yes. But make it wellness.
matcha.perfectDrink: Iced matcha with oat milk, blue spirulina, and a manifestation
matcha.shareText: I'm Chaos Matcha! Chaotic but make it wellness.
